description: Relocated in via Padre Giacinto 20. The restaurant takes its name from its chef Andrea, while the phrase “Sapori Montani” (mountain flavours) gives a good indication of the type of cuisine served ...
facilitiesServices: Air conditioning, Interesting wine list, Terrace, Wheelchair access
